meta.@content: Representative tactical visualization of a DICASS sonobuoy field.
An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding

Viewpoint.@description: Looking down from above - TODO check visibilityLimit

ExternProtoDeclare.@appinfo: Produce wireframe or transparent beam cylinders. Typical uses include propeller/thruster water flow or line-of-sight sonar/radar/light beams. Negative range values invert base and apex at same relative location. Default: beam with apex at (0 0 0) and base of radius 1 in x-z plane at (1 0 0).

field.@appinfo: Assigning a name to a BeamCylinder aids tracing
(communications) is transmitted signal in contact with receiver or (sensor) is a target return detected?
distance in meters along x axis
distance in meters used until eventIn range sent
whether wireframe beam is drawn
whether solid beam is drawn
meters across vertical y axis
meters across horizontal z axis
rendering color when contact=true
rendering color when contact=false
1 = fully transparent wireframe only

ExternProtoDeclare.@appinfo: CrossHair prototype provides a heads-up display (HUD) crosshair at the view center, which is useful for assessing NavigationInfo lookAt point

field.@appinfo: whether CrossHair prototype is enabled or not
control whether enabled/disabled
color of CrossHair marker
size of CrossHair in meters
distance in front of HUD viewpoint

ExternProtoDeclare.@appinfo: AN/SSQ-62B/C/D/E Directional Command Activated Sonobuoy System (DICASS) Sonobuoy

field.@appinfo: identifier label for this buoy
default value: AN/SSQ-62B
local surface coordinates X=North Z=East
local surface coordinates X=North Z=East
meters depth use negative numbers for subsurface
meters depth use negative numbers for subsurface
trigger event to bind/unbind viewpoint
local coordinates X=North Y=altitude Z=East
maximum audible sonar detection range meters
pingDuration corresponds to maxRange at 1500m/sec sound speed
trigger event to start single ping
trigger event to start continuous ping sequence
Can add linkable text for further information
url for linkable text
target window for linkable text
in-water sound speed m/s, default value 1500

ExternProtoDeclare.@appinfo: Line grid authoring tool to enable precise measurement of objects in 3D space - fixed position. Oriented along XZ plane size 20m by 20m.

field.@appinfo: Purpose of this grid displayed for overall Viewpoint
color for descriptive labels at grid edges and corners
default unscaled size: 10m by 10m
-X axis
-Z axis
+X axis
+Z axis
label location offset (in meters) to improve readability

ExternProtoDeclare.@appinfo: ViewPositionOrientation provides provides console output of local position and orientation as user navigates

field.@appinfo: Whether or not ViewPositionOrientation sends output to console
Output internal trace messages for debugging this node, intended for developer use only
Ability to turn output tracing on/off at runtime
Output local position
Output local orientation
MFString value of new Viewpoint

ExternProtoDeclare.@appinfo: Reads waypoints and legSpeeds/legDurations/defaultSpeed to provide a customizable position/orientation interpolator.

-children.#comment: Priority of use: legSpeeds (m/sec), legDurations (seconds), defaultSpeed (m/sec)

field.@appinfo: Short description of what is animated by this WaypointInterpolator.
Waypoints being traversed with interpolation of intermediate positions and orientations.
Add another single waypoint to array of waypoints recalculate interpolator values.
Replace all waypoints recalculate interpolator values.
Whether to pitch child geometry (such as a vehicle) up or down to match vertical slope
Units m/sec. If used, array lengths for legSpeeds and legDurations must be one less than number of waypoints.
Units in seconds. If used, array lengths for legSpeeds and legDurations must be one less than number of waypoints.
Units m/sec.
turningRate (degrees/second) also determines standoff distance prior to waypoint where turn commences. If 0 turns are instantaneous.
Output calculation summing all leg durations, useful for setting TimeSensor cycleInterval. Units in seconds.
exposed PositionInterpolator and OrientationInterpolator setting
exposed PositionInterpolator setting
exposed OrientationInterpolator setting
default color for non-active line segments
highlightSegmentColors must contain two color values for each endpoint of the highlight segment.
1.0 is completely transparent, 0.0 is completely opaque.
allowed values: none; waypoints (produce labels at each waypoint); or interpolation (produce single moving label at interpolator time course speed location)
allowed values: altitude depth (negate Y value) none
heightLabel relative location
heightLabel text size
heightLabel text color
enable console output to trace script computations and prototype progress
Output the number of waypoints totalDistance and totalDuration to console upon initialization
default color for vertical drop-line segments
1.0 is completely transparent, 0.0 is completely opaque.

-children.#comment: Priority of use: legSpeeds (m/sec), legDurations (seconds), defaultSpeed (m/sec)
Script SonobuoyFieldScenarioScript controls animation of DICAS sonar pings and helo commands
helo command to buoy (ramp and hold), blank during sonar operation
change color to indicate command/response sequence
